author: battibass
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds few new features to the DT online DQM to monitor data collected with the DT phase-2 slice test.
The updated features are only enabled within a private instance of the DT online DQM setup, therefore _no changes are expected_ due to this PR, nor in _offline workflows_, nor in the CMS _central online DQM_ setup.

#### PR validation:

The PR was validated testing it over several runs processed with a private instance of the DT online DQM.
title: DT DQM slice-test updates
